title: Check Mark

adjectives: Used to indicate something is right or correct.
verbs: Can be used to mark items as done or approved.
nouns: Represents a symbol for correctness, verification, or completion.

description: A simple, heavy check mark symbol, usually displayed in black. Commonly used to indicate correctness, confirmation, or a completed action.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the check mark emoji appears as a solid black tick with clean, sharp edges and a slight curve for a balanced appearance. It conveys affirmation, accuracy, or task completion in a straightforward, minimalist design.
